title: Fix This
body: So If Ima be honest my internet suck. anyway, when im in games i lag out games alot, now i have up to 20 min per queue. is there a way someone can help me pleas?

replies.body: We might be able to take some steps to tune-up your connection to be as strong as your internet allows.  When you have time, run a[ Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) which can help find any hiccups with your connection.  The page will provide some additional maintenance steps you can take should it find any hiccups.  Let me know if that helps!
